price: فرعون وويل: كه له ما پرته دې بل معبود ونيولو، هرومرو به دې له بنديانو وګرځوم.
arabic: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذۡتَ إِلَٰهًا غَيۡرِي لَأَجۡعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَسۡجُونِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qāla la-ini ittakhadhta ilāhan ghayrī la-ajʿalannaka mina al-masjūnīna
